ygData.subject: RE: Mask of deception
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I am able to enter Ogguk without problems when I use the guise of deception. The Bouncers con indifferent and the merchants inside con amiable. I am a
ygData.messageBody:
>On Wed, 2 Feb 2000, Papa Legba wrote:
>>
>> My enchanter (dark elf atheist) can walk through felwithe unmolested
>> with the hal elf illusion...
>
>Yes, contrary to the "difficulty" ratings Verant gave each
>class/race/diety, it is much much much easier for evil
>characters to become non-KOS to good classes/racese/dieties
>than vice versa.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...

I am able to enter Ogguk without problems when I use the guise of deception. The
Bouncers con indifferent and the merchants inside con amiable. I am a agnostic
woodelf btw. I picked this because thats what I am. I use the DE illusion
everytime I run through Ferrot or is resting outside CZ.

Musiker Silverdrum bard ot the 30th song, bertox
